content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was offering 1,000 Euros per month, while I was willing to pay between 700 and 800 Euros per month. We did not find a price that we both agreed on, so we did not reach a final agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 5 on a scale from 1 to 10. This is because while he was polite and willing to negotiate, we were unable to find a common ground on the price of the apartment, which is a crucial factor in any rental agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Mr. Schmidt was professional and respectful throughout the conversation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
